name: YouTube Realtime Dark
description:
This userstyle is a dark version of YouTube Realtime by Akshat Mittal. https://akshatmittal.com/youtube-realtime
There really isn't much else to say.
additional_info:
This is YouTube Realtime Dark v1.0.1

New changes:
Recolored clickable links to make them more obvious.

Known issues:
None at the moment.
